name: DHLL Space Janitor
description:
Made in 2 days.

I used this jam to learn how to create a weapon switching system, since I've never made a game with more than 1 weapon before! It definitely opened my eyes to the complexities of it, since I wasn't just switching out simple variables and graphics, but also changing how the projectiles function (1 is created going forward, 5 created in a cone going forward, and 1 created going backwards).

I'm excited to keep working on a more robust modular weapon changing system, and I'd be interested in seeing someone else's code or advice for one they have made before!
